Instance.description: A class holding common code between situations that are anchoring the groups autonomy to a specific position.

Tunable.name: group_filter
Tunable.description: The group filter for this visit.

TunableEnum.name: object_anchor_tag
TunableEnum.description: The tag that defines the objects that are valid for the anchor point. The situation will search the object manager for any object with this tag and will choose one at random. This object's position will be the anchor point. It is assumed that the roles in this situation will have an autonomy modifier with off_lot_autonomy_rule set to ANCHORED.
